trans-unit.source: How to: Use Media Services Management REST API
trans-unit.target: How to: Use Media Services Management REST API

trans-unit.source: The code in this topic defines the <languageKeyword>ManagementRESTAPIHelper</languageKeyword> class that demonstrates how to use Media Services Management REST APIs.
trans-unit.target: The code in this topic defines the <languageKeyword>ManagementRESTAPIHelper</languageKeyword> class that demonstrates how to use Media Services Management REST APIs.

trans-unit.source: The constructor of the class takes three arguments: the endpoint of your service, the associated management certificate thumbprint, and the subscription id.
trans-unit.target: The constructor of the class takes three arguments: the endpoint of your service, the associated management certificate thumbprint, and the subscription id.

trans-unit.source: For more information about management certificate thumbprint, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about management certificate thumbprint, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates the <languageKeyword>ManagementRESTAPIHelper</languageKeyword> class and calls one of its members.
trans-unit.target: The following example instantiates the <languageKeyword>ManagementRESTAPIHelper</languageKeyword> class and calls one of its members.
